alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 3:15PM CST until February 21 at 7:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Much of southern New Mexico and west Texas adjacent to the International Border, plus the Sacramento Mountains. * WHEN...From noon to 6 PM MST Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and low visibilities will likely develop mid to late Monday afternoon and impact the I-10 corridor from the Arizona border to El Paso. Other state highways such as NM Highways 9 and 11. Motorists are urged to use caution in these areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Western El Paso County
